ForearmsDBWristCurl.name: Dumbbell Wrist Curl
ForearmsDBWristCurl.preparation: Sit and grasp dumbbell with underhand grip. Rest forearm on thigh with wrist just beyond knee.
ForearmsDBWristCurl.execution: Allow dumbbell to roll out of palm down to fingers. Raise dumbbell back up by gripping and pointing knuckles up as high as possible. Lower and repeat.
ForearmsDBWristCurl.comments: Keep elbow approximately wrist height to maintain resistance through full range of motion. Hand may be placed under wrist to offer stability and to maintain horizontal orientation of forearm.

ForearmsDBUlnarFlexion.name: Dumbbell Ulnar Deviation
ForearmsDBUlnarFlexion.preparation: Grasp half loaded dumbbell with plate on pinkie side. Position arm down to side.
ForearmsDBUlnarFlexion.execution: Bend wrist so weighted side is pulled upward. Lower until weighted side is pointing downward. Repeat.
ForearmsDBUlnarFlexion.comments: If half loaded dumbbell is not available, one of two substitutes can be used. Empty metal bar to increase resistance grasp further away from center with longer end on pinkie side.Standard dumbbell grasp so thumb side is against inside of weight plate.
